thread.title: Property Investors Ignore Saber-Rattling in Pursuit of South Korea Deals

author: Peter Grant
title: Property Investors Ignore Saber-Rattling in Pursuit of South Korea Deals
text:
Investors in some real-estate markets might get a case of the jitters if a volatile dictator 120 miles away habitually warned he had the ability to obliterate his neighboring country.
But in South Korea, saber rattling over the past year has barely fazed investors in the real-estate market that would likely suffer the most damage if such an unthinkable event occurred.
Rather,... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
